# Create and format the flextable
ft <- dat %>%
  flextable() %>%
  theme_vanilla() %>%
  fontsize(size = 10) %>%
  autofit() %>%
  align(align = "left", part = "all") %>%
  border_outer(part = "all") %>%
  border_inner_h(part = "all") %>%
  border_inner_v(part = "all") %>%
  set_table_properties(layout = "autofit") %>% 
        set_caption("Environmental variables used to fit and simulate from Hmsc models")

# Add some padding and set header style
ft <- ft %>%
  padding(padding = 4, part = "all") %>%
  bold(part = "header")
